no-duplicate-includes.errorMessage: Changelog file '%s' was included more than once

schema-name.errorMessage: Must use schema name token, not %s

file-name-no-spaces.errorMessage: Changelog filenames should not contain spaces

no-preconditions.errorMessage: Preconditions are not allowed in this project

has-comment.errorMessage: Change set must have a comment

has-context.errorMessage: Should have at least one context on the change set

valid-context.errorMessage: Context is incorrect, should end with '_test' or '_script'

isolate-ddl-changes.errorMessage: Should only have a single ddl change per change set

separate-ddl-context.errorMessage: Should have a ddl changes under ddl contexts

table-name.errorMessage: Table '%s' name must be uppercase, use '_' separation and not start with TBL

table-name-length.errorMessage: Table '%s' name must not be longer than %d

object-name.errorMessage: Object name '%s' name must be uppercase and use '_' separation

object-name-length.errorMessage: Object name '%s' must be less than %d characters

create-table-remarks.errorMessage: Create table must contain remark attribute

create-column-nullable-constraint.errorMessage: Add column must specify nullable constraint

create-column-no-define-primary-key.errorMessage: Add column must not use primary key attribute. Instead use AddPrimaryKey change type

modify-data-enforce-where.errorMessage: Modify data on table '%s' must have a where condition

modify-data-starts-with-where.errorMessage: Modify data where starts with where, that's probably a mistake

create-index-name.errorMessage: Index '%s' must follow pattern table name followed by 'I' and a number e.g. APPLICATION_I1, or match a primary key or unique constraint name

unique-constraint-name.errorMessage: Unique constraint '%s' must follow pattern table name followed by 'U' and a number e.g. TABLE_U1

primary-key-must-be-named.errorMessage: Primary key constraint '%s' must end with '_PK' e.g. TABLE_PK

primary-key-must-use-table-name.errorMessage: Primary key constraint '%s' must follow pattern table name followed by '_PK' e.g. TABLE_PK

foreign-key-must-be-named.errorMessage: Foreign key constraint '%s' must end with '_FK'. e.g. ORDER_CUSTOMER_FK

foreign-key-must-use-base-and-referenced.errorMessage: Foreign key constraint '%s' must follow pattern {base_table_name}_{parent_table_name}_FK. e.g. ORDER_CUSTOMER_FK

drop-not-null-require-column-data-type.errorMessage: Drop not null constraint column data type attribute must be populated
